item.title: Cisco Wide Area Application Services system (WAAS/WAVE/WAE)
item.description: The Cisco WAAS system consists of a set of devices that work together to optimize TCP network traffic. There are two types of devices that run WAAS software: Cisco Wide Area Application Engine (WAE) Cisco Wide Area Virtualization Engine (WAVE) WAVE appliances implement virtualization: virtual blades can run one or more virtualized OSes within the WAVE appliance.
